ygData.subject: Re: Got to 34
ygData.msgSnippet: The specs can go as high as lvl. 37, so I can only guess that the feerott specs were not as high a level when you were soloing them. Otherwise, I can t imagine
ygData.messageBody:
The specs can go as high as lvl. 37, so I can only guess that the feerott
specs were not as high a level when you were soloing them.

Otherwise, I can't imagine how you could get any spells to stick on a mob 5
levels above yourself.

At 01:59 PM 12/22/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "James Harless" <jharless@...>
>
>Well... I had different experiences with Spectres. I solo'd the one on the
>hill in Feerott at 32nd level quite easily. The only problem is finding it
>uncamped. If you're lucky, a group of high levels might be there pulling the
>cave and all. While this sounds like an unfortunate situation, I was able
>to convince them to let me have the lone hill spawn a few times (since they
>had the entire cave). As for strategy, I think Spectres are one of the most
>susceptible mobs in the game to Darkness... which makes them totally pud. I
>didn't use my pet, but it was also before the kiting patch. I suppose a
>darkness + fear + pet would work pretty well. I found that they didn't root
>very well, tho. Especially with the undead root.. so beware of that. Oh..
>another tip.. if you do root with the undead root, sometimes you can't use
>the other normal root right afterwards (it says 'Your spell did not take
>hold'). I think it is some kind of bug with the undead one.. thinking that
>the mob is still rooted with a higher level root (since that one is a 16th
>level including damage and the other one is a 4th level wizzie root).
>
>James
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Dave Karpman <davek@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, December 22, 1999 12:55 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Got to 34
>
>
> > From: Dave Karpman <davek@...>
> >
> > I would not solo specs until you are at least 2 shades of blue over them.
> > They are mean critters, and if your first darkness/fear spell does not
> > stick, you may not get another chance.
> >
> > You are far better off soloing Vhalen at the well in SK.
> >
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
>tolerated



Dave Karpman davek@...

The demon is a liar. He will lie to confuse us. But he will also mix lies
with the truth to attack us. The attack is psychological, but powerful. So
don't listen, remember that, do not listen.

- "The Exorcist"
